params.amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

returns._0: address Address of Fleet commander managing the ark if a Commander is assigned, address(0) otherwise

params.amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw

params.account: The account to which the Commander role will be granted

params.additionalData: Optional bytes that might be required by a specific protocol to harvest

returns._0: The number of reward tokens harvested

params.amount: The amount of tokens to move
params.receiver: The address of the Ark the funds will be boarded to

returns._0: The address of the Raft contract
The current rate in RAY precision

params.account: The account from which the Commander role will be revoked

returns._0: The IERC20 interface of the managed token
The total assets in the Ark, in token precision

commander().notice: Returns the address of the Fleet commander managing the ark

grantCommanderRole(address).notice: Grants the Commander role to a given account

harvest(address,bytes).notice: Triggers a harvest operation to collect rewards

maxAllocation().notice: Returns the maximum allocation for this Ark

move(uint256,address).notice: Moves tokens from one ark to another

raft().notice: Returns the address of the associated Raft contract

rate().notice: Returns the current rate of the Ark

revokeCommanderRole(address).notice: Revokes the Commander role from a given account

setMaxAllocation(uint256).notice: Sets a new maximum allocation for the Ark

token().notice: Returns the ERC20 token managed by this Ark

totalAssets().notice: Returns the current underlying balance of the Ark
